content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, it's good to meet you. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my apartment. So, let's discuss the rental price that you are willing to pay.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I see, that's a very reasonable offer. However, as a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my apartment. So, I would like to suggest a higher rental price of 900 Euros per month. This would be a fair price for the size and location of the apartment, as well as the quality of the amenities and services provided.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand your point of view, but I am not willing to pay 900 Euros per month. I am only willing to pay 800 Euros per month.

If you would like to accept my offer of 800 Euros per month, please let me know.

Otherwise, I will have to look for another apartment.

Thank you for your time.

Goodbye.

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Baihu Li. However, as a landlord, I need to consider my own financial needs and goals. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am not willing to accept your offer of 800 Euros per month. I am looking for a rental price that will help me maximize my gains and ensure that I am getting the best possible return on my investment. So, I will need to continue our negotiation in order to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Thank you for your understanding, and I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Heinrich Heine
